text: Hu Biao () (born May 1947) is a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Shaoyang, Hunan. He joined the Communist Party of China in 1966.胡彪简历 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Hunan Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Hunan Category:Politicians from Shaoyang Category:Living people
title: Hu Biao
